00040 using namespace Hypertable;
00041 using namespace Serialization;
00042 using namespace Error;
00043 
00047 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event) {
00048 
00049   if (event->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00050     ApplicationHandler *hp = 0;
00051 
00052     //event->display()
00053 
00054     try {
00055 
00056       // sanity check command code
00057       if (event->header.command < 0
00058           || event->header.command >= MasterProtocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00059         HT_THROWF(PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00060                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00061 
00062       switch (event->header.command) {
00063       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE:
00064         hp = new RequestHandlerCreateTable(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), event);
00065         break;
00066       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_TABLE:
00067         hp = new RequestHandlerDropTable(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), event);
00068         break;
00069       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_GET_SCHEMA:
00070         hp = new RequestHandlerGetSchema(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), event);
00071         break;
00072       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00073         hp = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), event);
00074         break;
00075       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_REGISTER_SERVER:
00076         hp = new RequestHandlerRegisterServer(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(),
00077                                               event);
00078         break;
00079       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_REPORT_SPLIT:
00080         hp = new RequestHandlerReportSplit(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), event);
00081         break;
00082       case MasterProtocol::COMMAND_SHUTDOWN:
00083         hp = new RequestHandlerShutdown(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), event);
00084         break;
00085       default:
00086         HT_THROWF(PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00087                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00088       }
00089       m_app_queue_ptr->add(hp);
00090     }
00091     catch (Exception &e) {
00092       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event);
00093       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00094       std::string errmsg = format("%s - %s", e.what(), get_text(e.code()));
00095       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errmsg);
00096     }
00097   }
00098   else {
00099     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00100   }
00101 
00102 }
